Consultant Letter



{{ doc.employee_name or '' }}


{{ doc.current_address or '' }}



Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

We are pleased to avail your services on a Retainership basis in our {{ doc.designation }} at {{ doc.branch or '' }} from {{ date_of_joining or '' }} on the following terms and conditions:

  1. You shall offer and the company shall avail your services in our {{ doc.designation }} at Location as "{{ doc.employment_type or '' }}". You shall be officiated as Title.

  2. This arrangement is on principal-to-principal basis and you shall neither construe nor at any time claim to be an Employee of the Company or an Agent of the Company.

  3. Your appointment is on a full time basis and your office timings will conform to our regular working hours. You will also have to undertake official tours for Company’s work as and when required and as may be approved by the Management.

  4. Please refer Annexure A for your professional fee detail.

  5. During the continuance of your employment with us:

    1. You shall not divulge or disclose or cause to disclose to any person, association, agency or any Company the information and data to which you have access during your association with the Company.

    2. You will be responsible for safekeeping, maintaining in good condition and return in good condition and order of all properties and / or assets, which may be entrusted to you by the Company. The Company shall have the right to deduct money value of all such properties and / or assets from your dues and take such other action as it may deem proper in the event of your failure to account for such property to its satisfaction.

    3. You will abide by all the applicable rules and regulations, procedures and practices of the Company in force from time to time.







  6. The Company may allow your, absence from work for a maximum period of {{ doc.custom_maximum_absense_period or '' }} days in a year without making any deduction from the professional fee. A proportionate deduction will be made for all unauthorized absence and absence beyond {{ doc.custom_maximum_absense_period or '' }} days in a year. These leaves will be granted only if you a certain minimum number of days of attendance is recorded each month and year. The leave cannot be carried forward from one year to another year. You shall not be allowed to encash any un availed leave at the end of the year.

  7. During the period of your engagement/agreement period with the Company or at any time thereafter except in the course of performance of your duties in the Company’s services, you shall not use, divulge or disclose or cause to used, divulged or disclose to any person, association, agency or any Company any of the information, technical or commercial formulae or secrets concerning the business of the Company, which you may have acquired in the course of or as incidental to your engagement/agreement with the Company.

  8. If at any time in the opinion of the Company (which opinion shall be final and binding on you) you are found guilty of dishonesty, disobedience, disorderly behavior, negligence, indiscipline, moral turpitude or any other conduct considered by the Company to be detrimental to its interest, your services may be terminated without giving you any notice or compensation.

  9. During the tenure of this engagement/agreement and one year thereafter, whether you are in the employment of the Company or not, you shall not for any part of your time, either individually or in any other manner and either directly or indirectly work, negotiate for, enter the services of or be employed with or accept any consultation or supervision work whether honorary or otherwise with or be interested in or concerned with any person, firm or Company or body of persons whether incorporated or not and carrying on or engaged or interested in, or about to carry on or engage or interest itself or themselves in any business, trade, vocation, calling or occupation of like or similar or competitive nature with that of the Company and further shall not engage or be interested in any other business trade, vocation, calling or occupation of like or similar or competitive nature with that of the Company.

  10. This arrangement shall come into effect from {{ contract_start or '' }} to {{ contract_end or '' }}, and may be renewed from time to time by mutual consent in writing.

  11. Either party can terminate this arrangement any time before the expiry of tenure by giving one-month notice or by paying an amount equivalent to one month of Professional Fees in lieu thereof to the other party.

  12. You shall report to the {{ doc.reports_to or '' }}: {{ reporting_person.employee_name or '' }}, {{ reporting_person.designation }} & {{ doc.branch or '' }} or to such other person(s) as may be designated from time to time.

Yours faithfully,
For {{ doc.company }}



{{ doc.employee_name }}
{{ doc.designation }}

Emolument


ANNEXURE
Consolidated ({{ doc.salary_currency or '' }}) Sum Per Month {{ doc.custom_consultant_fee or "" }}
TOTAL CONSOLIDATED ({{ doc.salary_currency or '' }}) SUM Per Annum {%- if doc.custom_consultant_fee -%} {% set annual_fee = doc.custom_consultant_fee*12 %} {{ annual_fee or "" }} {%- endif -%}

You will not be entitled for any payment other than that mentioned herein.

Your responsibilities and your authority would remain unchanged as it existed before your retirement.

Insurance Coverage

You will be eligible for coverage under the insurances as under. You are requested to get in touch with the HR Dept. and understand the regulations in force at the time of your joining.

  1. Medical Insurance: Coverage for Self, Spouse & Children Company will bear 50% of the premium for Self and Spouse up to the maximum, the remaining 50% will be borne by you. Any Premium contribution for children will be borne 100% by you.

  2. Personal Accident Insurance: Coverage for Self only to the extent decided by the Company.

Please signify your acceptance of the aforesaid terms and conditions by affixing your signature on the duplicate copy.


Yours faithfully,
For {{ doc.company }}



{{ doc.employee_name }}
{{ doc.designation }}
I accept the above
name: Consultant Letter
